column4: http://pastebin.com/jcSe2r01 here is my error, can someone help?
then  sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start or   sudo restart gdm
so i restarted it okay, i dn't see any errors in the console, but i still have my problem - i double click anything on the desktop, and nothing happens!
what were you doing  or installing or uninstalling just before all of this occurred??
i haven't installed anything, i was writing some code, nothing that would really be similar as i can recall
are there error logs or something?
mmm  this is puzzling then....  you can check under system administration for log files
although ...unless you actually ran the code you were creating ...this makes no sense
yes it is weird, i don't know whats going on
ok you could create a new user account and see if everything works in that then remove the old account
do i just make a new user in teh console, and then run gdm as that user?
yes if you know how to create a user via terminal that should be fine
